TITLE: Basic Cloudscape Button component implementation in React DESCRIPTION: A simple React example showing how to import and use a Button component from the Cloudscape Design System. The example imports the necessary CSS and renders a primary button with click functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import Button from '@cloudscape-design/components/button'; import '@cloudscape-design/global-styles/index.css'; function App() { return ; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Cloudscape components and global styles via npm DESCRIPTION: Shell command to install both the Cloudscape Design System components package and the global styles package using npm. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install @cloudscape-design/components @cloudscape-design/global-styles ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Dialog Cell with Interactive Elements in HTML Grid DESCRIPTION: Example of how to implement a dialog cell containing interactive elements (input and buttons) where grid navigation is suppressed when these elements are focused. Uses role="dialog" to manage keyboard behavior conflicts. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/src/table/table-role/grid-navigation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloning and Installing Dependencies for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Commands to clone the Cloudscape Design Components repository and install the necessary dependencies. This is the first step in setting up the project for development. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` git clone git@github.com:cloudscape-design/components.git cd components npm install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Command to generate the build artifacts for the Cloudscape Design Components project. This step is necessary before starting the development server. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Development Server for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Command to start the webpack-dev-server for Cloudscape Design Components. This server runs on http://localhost:8080 and watches for file changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm start ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running All Tests for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Command to run all tests for the Cloudscape Design Components project, including build-tool tests, unit tests, integration tests, and motion tests. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm test ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Unit Tests for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Command to run build tool and unit tests for the Cloudscape Design Components project. These tests emulate a browser environment using JSDOM. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run test:unit ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Integration Tests for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Commands to run integration tests for Cloudscape Design Components. These tests run against real browser behavior on Chrome with motion disabled. Requires ChromeDriver to be installed. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm i -g chromedriver npm start npm run test:integ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Motion Tests for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Commands to run motion tests for Cloudscape Design Components. These tests run on Chrome with motion enabled. Requires ChromeDriver to be installed and the dev server to be running. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm i -g chromedriver npm start npm test:motion ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Single Test Suites for Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Examples of running single test suites for different components and test types in the Cloudscape Design Components project using Jest directly with appropriate configurations. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx jest -c jest.unit.config.js src/button/__tests__/button.test.tsx npx jest -c jest.integ.config.js src/input npx jest -c jest.motion.config.js src/flashbar npx jest -c jest.build-tools.config.js build-tools/stylelint ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Node Options for Jest in Cloudscape Design Components DESCRIPTION: Command to set Node options to fix potential errors related to experimental VM modules when running Jest directly in the Cloudscape Design Components project. SOURCE: https://github.com/cloudscape-design/components/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` export NODE_OPTIONS="$NODE_OPTIONS --experimental-vm-modules" ```
